Question & Options:
Which award did Konkona Sen Sharma win for her role in 'Life in a... Metro'?
Options:
A. Best Actress
B. Best Supporting Actress
C. Best Newcomer
D. Best Director

Which award was Konkona Sen Sharma nominated for at the Zee Cine Awards?
Options:
A. Best Actress
B. Best Actor in a Supporting Role - Female
C. Best Debut
D. Best Director
Correct Answer: Best Actor in a Supporting Role - Female
